nodes.bodyText: A comment why/where this is needed might be good
Eliminated after updating manual distinct implementation as new implementation supports adding null values directly.
A bit hard to follow, but does make the following tests really easy 👍
Added a number of comments to assist in reasoning.

Keeping track of null values as they are still considered distinct. Previous implementation used container not allow null values directly. The current list allows null values, so eliminated the NULL_PLACEHOLDER.
Does this indexing distincting still makes sense or should it be combined with the above test case?

As per discussion I have removed explicit differentiation of testing distinct on both indexed and non-indexed fields. The synchronous tests covers all types for direct, linked and nested linked objects. Async and multi argument distinct are only smoke tested for some types and unsupported types.
